reviewText: Eye-opening experience for my high school students. Highly recommended as we wrestle with international responsibilities in America. Good for any grade level.

Don't watch 60 minutes al the but this one caught.my intrest. That was one of the BEST and at the same time SADDEST interviews I ever saw. It's hard to believe that kind of suffering exist in this world. Makes me realize no matter how bad things are or how bad they can get, it's really nothing compared to what he went through,not to mention all the people who died (and still are) that we'll never even know about.
Good job 60 minutes!!
